DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine which Arm (capecitabine + irinotecan versus capecitabine + cisplatin) shows higher response rates in the treatment of advanced gastric-oesophagal cancer Furthermore, comparison of progression-free survival, 1-year survival, Quality of Life and safety
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Irinotecan and Capecitabine Versus(vs) Cisplatin and Capecitabine in Patients With Esophago-Gastric Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: capecitabine + irinotecan versus capecitabine + cisplatin, as published by Kang et al. (ASCO 2006)
DOC.criteria: gastric or gastricoesophagal junction adenocarcinoma unidimensional measurable disease Karnofsky index >/=60% prior chemo or radiotherapy colorectal diseases brain metastases
